titles.title: A resolution affirming the support of the United States for the Republic of North Macedonia's accession to the European Union.
A resolution affirming the support of the United States for the Republic of North Macedonia's accession to the European Union.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution encourages North Macedonia to continue its work toward membership in the European Union (EU). The resolution also appreciates North Macedonia's active role in regional cooperation and long-standing commitment to the EU accession process and recognizes that there is strong support for EU membership across North Macedonia's multiethnic communities.
